summary: The video discusses celebrities who have changed their last names to avoid being associated with their famous relatives. It mentions Malia Obama, Angelina Jolie, Stefan Gordy, Skylar Gordy, and Nicolas Cage. The narrator explains why they changed their names, such as avoiding teasing or maintaining privacy. The video includes images of these individuals with their new and original names displayed.
keywords: Malia Obama, Malia Ann, Angelina Jolie, Angelina Jolie Voight, Stefan Gordy, Skylar Gordy, Nicolas Cage, Nicolas Coppola, Francis Ford Coppola, Sundance Film Festival, MTV Movie Awards
